this was my idea for the crawl albeit from my own fan script for episode 8
The FIRST ORDER has triumphed! With it's naval fleet severely weakened and unable to protect its loyalists many star systems have abandoned the decimated REPUBLIC.
Struggling, the REPUBLIC now looks to the RESISTANCE as it's only hope of military protection.
Meanwhile KYLO REN still pursuing REY and her cohorts, has captured a RESISTANCE spy who may know their location...
